channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Here are over 20 gadgets that’ll help you achieve your New Year’s resolutions
item.description: It happens every year: we set ambitious New Year's resolutions - work out more, spend less, keep the house cleaner - full of optimism and motivation. Then life happens, and suddenly it's June and you can't recall what your resolutions even were. But it doesn't have to be that way. Sometimes the problem isn't a […]

item.title: Chicken versus traffic! My obsession with the world’s most addictive hopper
item.description: Homescreen Heroes: Crossy Road is an 8-bit endless hopper game that’s free and fun to play

item.title: On a essayé le mode souris de la Nintendo Switch 2 : un défaut évident malgré une belle expérience de jeu
item.description: C'était l'une des innovations apportées par Nintendo avec sa nouvelle console de jeu. Le mode souris des Joy-Con 2, notamment pensé pour les FPS, offre une expérience de jeu nouvelle pour les joueurs habitués à l'écosystème Nintendo. Nous l'avons testé : voici notre avis.

item.title: Cette élégante caméra intérieure filme en 2K 130° à 30 FPS surveille votre logement avec une ristourne de 30€
item.description: Avec la Netatmo Advance 2K, vous avez une caméra compacte qui filme en 2K avec un angle de vue de 130°. Elle a été lancée il y a un an et elle baisse enfin son prix avec les soldes d’hiver 2026. Chez Boulanger, on la trouve avec 30 euros de remise.

item.title: Test de l’Asus ROG Azoth X : sa frappe m’a fait changer d’avis
item.description: Asus prouve qu'il n'y a plus besoin de passer ses week-ends à lubrifier des ressorts pour obtenir la frappe parfaite, il suffit juste d'avoir le courage de dépenser 300 euros.

item.title: I tested the Insta360 Link 2 pan-and-track webcam - and it's helped me deliver far more engaging online training
item.description: The Insta360 Link 2 is essentially an evolved webcam, and features an AI-powered 4K camera with a physical gimbal and advanced modes such as DeskView, whiteboard mode, and gesture control that make it a perfect partner for anyone looking to livestream, hold online lectures, or engage in more advanced video conferencing.

item.title: Wing's drone deliveries are coming to 150 more Walmarts
item.description: Don't be surprised if you see even more drones delivering groceries across the US since the Alphabet-owned Wing announced another service expansion with Walmart over the next year. The partnership said that drone delivery services will be available at 150 more Walmart locations in Los Angeles, St. Louis, Cincinnati, Miami and more metros that have yet to be announced. According to Wing, its top 25 percent of customers have ordered its delivery drones up to three times a week. To meet growing demand, Wing and Walmart said it will serve up to 40 million US customers and build up a network of 270...

item.title: Quel smartphone photo choisir en 2026 ? Nos tests et recommandations
item.description: L'appareil photo est souvent un point majeur lorsqu’il s’agit de choisir un nouveau téléphone. Lors de nos tests, c'est un domaine que nous scrutons précisément. Voici notre sélection des meilleurs smartphones photo du marché.

item.title: The Night Manager season 2: release schedule, trailer, cast, plot, and what else we know
item.description: The Night Manager returns to our screens after nearly a decade. Here's what you need to know about season 2.

item.title: Google removes AI Overviews for certain medical queries
item.description: This follows an investigation by the Guardian that found Google AI Overviews offering misleading information in response to some health-related queries.

item.title: Hypertrucages sexualisés | Le gouvernement fédéral n’envisage pas de bannir la plateforme X
item.description: Le gouvernement fédéral n’envisage pas de bannir la plateforme X, a indiqué le ministre de l’Intelligence artificielle et l’Innovation numérique, Evan Solomon.

item.title: Test de l’Eureka FloorShine 880 : puissant, chaud, mais bavard
item.description: Tineco et Dreame se partagent le gâteau des balais laveurs, mais Eureka débarque avec les coudes sortis. Son arme ? Une fiche technique qui ne respecte rien : 24 000 Pa d'aspiration et une stérilisation thermique radicale.

item.title: Games Workshop’s Warhammer World Hits the U.S. Next Year
item.description: North American fans of 'Warhammer' can rejoice at getting a Warhammer World of their own to visit sometime at the end of 2027.

item.title: SpaceX just got approval to launch another 7,500 next-gen Starlink satellites into orbit
item.description: Starlink will have 15,000 Gen2 satellites in space within the next five years, after a regulatory decision.

item.title: Indonesia and Malaysia block Grok access, UK threatens ban as explicit deepfake problem grows
item.description: Foreign governments are now limiting access to Elon Musk's Grok chatbot as concerns about non-consensual sexual deepfakes linger.

item.title: Instagram says it fixed the issue that let someone send all those password reset emails
item.description: If you're one of the many, many people who received a password reset email from Instagram the other day, the company says it fixed the issue. What was the issue? Unclear. We reached out to Meta for clarification and have yet to receive a response. All we know is that an "external party" triggered the […]

item.title: Micron announces a QLC SSD just weeks after killing its beloved Crucial brand — the 3610 is a basic Gen5 SSD that's somehow faster than Gen4 TLC
item.description: Micron 3610 PCIe Gen5 NVMe SSD offers high-speed QLC storage, low latency, AI readiness, compact form, and strong endurance.
